definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Why everybody liked him was what puzzled Jo, at first.
sentences.chinese: 首先，为什么每个人都喜欢教授，这令乔迷惑不解。
这个问题使我迷惑不解。

sentences.english: It baffled me that he rejected my offer.
sentences.chinese: 他拒绝我的建议使我迷惑不解。

sentences.english: What puzzles me is how he was able to cover such a long distance on foot.
sentences.chinese: 让我迷惑不解的是他如何能徒步走那么远。

sentences.english: This problem is hard enough to perplex even the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题确实很难，连老师都迷惑不解。

sentences.english: I'm quite mystified about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 我对发生的事十分迷惑不解。
孩子们都像是迷惑不解。

sentences.english: A:I'm all at a loss.I don't know what I should do to his invitation.
sentences.chinese: 我迷惑不解，不知道怎么处理他的邀请。

sentences.english: The Hui people's wheels of turn up , human being feel ignorant , are baffled.
sentences.chinese: 轮轮回回的出现，人类感到无知，迷惑不解。

sentences.english: It mysti?fied most demons. It wasn't the least bit necessary.
sentences.chinese: 让大部分恶魔迷惑不解的是，其实这些完全没有必要。

sentences.english: What puzzles them, I can tell, is my control.
sentences.chinese: 使他们迷惑不解的，我可以断定，是我的克制。

sentences.english: He looked at me in open-mouthed bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 他张着嘴迷惑不解地看着我。

sentences.english: He was also confused by the black stones people used to burn for fuel.
sentences.chinese: 黑石头被用来当燃料烧，他也感到迷惑不解。

sentences.english: I'm completely mystified about what happened.
sentences.chinese: 我对所发生的事压根儿迷惑不解。

sentences.english: She gives the bewildered Octavian to Sophie and quietly leaves the room.
sentences.chinese: 她将迷惑不解的奥克塔维交给苏菲，静静离去。

sentences.english: Looking at his confused face, I felt annoyed.
sentences.chinese: 看到他迷惑不解的脸，我又好气又好笑。

definition: to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom)/to remain perplexed despite much thought
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]
pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3

definition: to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
to be unable to make any sense of the matter/to be at a loss
to not know the reason/to not know what to do
